DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine Mindfulness Based Stress Reduction ( MBSR ) effective intervention lower blood pressure early unmedicated hypertensive .
DOC.brief_title: HARMONY Study ( Hypertension Analysis Stress Reduction Using Mindfulness Meditation Yoga )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 20 75 year 2 . Hypertension ABPM baseline ( daytime > 135/85 mmHg 24hour ABPM > 130/80 mmHg ) 1 . Use antihypertensive within 6 month screen ABPM . 2 . Screening office BP > 180/100 ABPM > 160/100 mmHg . 3 . Diabetes 4 . Secondary hypertension 5 . Renal disease ( GFR < 60 ml/min overt nephropathy ) 6 . History heart attack 7 . Stroke TIA 8 . Revascularization procedure . 9 . Active malignant disease ( except nonmelanoma skin cancer ) 10 . Epileptic seizure 6 month screen visit . 11 . Congestive heart failure 12 . Severe liver disease 13 . Pregnancy lactation period 14 . Participation clinical trial receipt investigational compound treatment 3 month prior initial screen visit . 15 . Planned elective surgery study period except cataract surgery
